resources.string: Songbook Manager is a small Android Application to display TKaraoke song ID for selecting songs from TKaraoke. SongbookMgr can also do limited control of TKaraoke software if sbConnectionMgr server is installed on the PC side. All the icons used in this app are free from www.findicons.com. Since this is my first Android app, I really need a ton of help in getting started -- and I did find it on the Web thanks to numerous mentors who would not mind sacrifying their valuable time to teach newbee like me to get on Android software development.

The songbook catalog file must be generated by TKaraoke software when the user choose Generate Song Catalog from its Tools menu. TKaraoke normally defaults to using parentheses to enclose the singer names. SongbookMgr will look for these symbols to delimit the songs/singers during import. If the songs happen to have parentheses in their names, angle brackets (\u003c\u003e) must be used so that SongbookMgr can distinguish between song and singer columns.

The songbook can be imported directly into SongbookMgr if a server program named sbConnectionMgr is running on the media server computer. This program will generate an XML stream from TKaraoke song catalog then send it directly to SongbookMgr. There is no need to copy the songbook catalog to the device before parsing it out. This is the preferred method to get the songbook catalog to the phone.

Before SongbookMgr can operate with TKaraoke Player, a songbook catalog must be imported into SongbookMgr. There are two ways to import the songbook catalog. The first and easiest way is to have TKaraoke software generate and save the songbook catalog using the default name, then register this file with sbConnectionMgr (one time setup) When the user clicks on \u0022Import from Server\u0022, SongbookMgr sends a command to sbConnectionMgr and have it upload directly into SongbookMgr. The songbook catalog file can also be either copied or emailed to the phone from the media server computer for manually imported into SongbookMgr
